name: Missile Barrage
description: Equipped with homing system, the missiles deal damage from all directions so your enemies have nowhere to run. Fight with your best partner by your side!
source: Summon a missile launcher for **8** seconds. **90**-second cooldown. Fire multiple missiles to attack nearby enemies, each dealing damage equal to **30%** of ATK.

advancement.description: Number of missiles launched increases every second.
Increase physical damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.
